name: Helicopter Warzone
description:
Helicopter warzone is an Action/adventure game with smooth touch controls. The main draw of the game is progressing through different challenging levels with rescuing peoples by eliminating air defenses.

[How to Play Top action, adventure android game]
It’s time to be a lifesaver. Enemies are keeping poor people as hostages in the war zone. You have to fly your helicopter to rescue them. For that eliminate all the air defenses. You can eliminate air defense by firing at them and releasing bombs to top of the air defense. And be aware of flying drones, if they hit the helicopter it will be exploded. Unlock new levels by rescuing all hostages in current level. On each new level difficulty will be increased.

[Earn money]
You can collect coins by destroying drones. Use coins to buy new player models and other stuffs. You can earn coins easily by watching Ads.

Features:

🚁 Smooth touch controls
🚁 Challenging new different levels.
🚁 Cool pixel graphics.
🚁 New levels will be added on every update.

Rescue hostages and be a warrior !
